content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Mr. Rahman, it's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you are interested in renting my apartment in Munich. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay for the 25 square meters apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your time, Mr. Heine. I'm looking for a place that I can call home while I study here in Munich. name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Rahman. 650 Euro per month is a fair price for the apartment. However, as a landlord, I am always looking to maximize my gains. Would you be willing to negotiate a higher price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Heine. I understand that you're looking to maximize your income. I'm prepared to increase my offer to 675 Euro per month. This is my final offer, as I want to ensure a fair deal for both parties. Would you be able to accept this price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Your offer of 675 Euro per month is indeed a good one, Mr. Rahman. As a landlord, I am responsible for ensuring that the apartment is well-maintained and that my tenants are comfortable. name: Heinrich Heine
